name: products_v2_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool asos.
Tool description: Asos API helps to query for all information about categories, products, etc... as on the official website
API description: Fetches a list of products from the ASOS store with various filtering and sorting options.

store.description: The store identifier obtained from the countries/list API.

offset.description: The offset to skip already viewed products.

categoryid.description: The value of categoryId field from categories/list API

limit.description: The number of items per page.

attribute_1046.description: Filter option by Style (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&attribute_1046=8391,8392

pricemin.description: Filter option by Min Price ( integer value )

attribute_10147.description: Filter option by Leather / Non Leather (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&attribute_10147=8391,8392

sort.description: Sorting option, one of 'pricedesc', 'priceasc', or 'freshness'; default is 'freshness'.

q.description: Search for products by name (do not use this parameter with categoryId)

base_colour.description: Filter option by Color, look for "id" of "facetValues" in the response of this API (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&base_colour=8391,8392

range.description: Filter option by Sale/New Season (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&range=new_season

attribute_1047.description: Filter option by Product Type (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&attribute_1047=8391,8392

currency.description: Currency code obtained from countries/list API; default is 'USD'.

attribute_10155.description: Filter option by Range (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&attribute_10155=8391,8392

pricemax.description: Filter option by Max Price ( integer value )

sizeschema.description: Size schema identifier obtained from countries/list API; default is 'US'.

brand.description: Filter option by Brand, look for "id" of "facetValues" in the response of this API (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&brand=8391,8392

size.description: Filter option by Size, look for "id" of "facetValues" in the response of this API (separated by comma for multiple values), such as : ...&size=8391,8392
